summary: This document is an email exchange between Darren Indyke and Cynthia Rodriguez discussing the tax implications of a trust governed by US Virgin Islands law. Cynthia seeks clarification regarding a missing tax ID number for the Pierre Trust, which is associated with a foreign national grantor.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is seeking clarification on tax matters related to the Pierre Trust and is communicating with Darren Indyke for assistance.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is providing legal advice regarding the trust's tax status and responding to inquiries from Cynthia Rodriguez.

connections.description: Cynthia Rodriguez is seeking legal clarification from Darren Indyke regarding the trust's tax implications.

keyFacts: Cynthia Rodriguez is an Assistant Vice President at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Darren Indyke is an attorney associated with Darren K. Indyke, PLLC.
The Pierre Trust is governed by US Virgin Islands law and is associated with a foreign national grantor.
There is a question regarding the missing tax ID number for the Pierre Trust.
The communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.
